name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: iPhone 15 Pro Max features a sophisticated titanium design with Ceramic Shield front and textured matte glass back. Available in Black Titanium, White Titanium, Blue Titanium, and Natural Titanium finishes. Dimensions: 76.7 x 159.9 x 8.25 mm, weighing 221 grams.

name: JPlayStation 5 (PS5)
description: This soft lambswool jumper is knitted in Scotland, using yarn from one of the world's oldest spinners based in Fife. Once knitted, the garment is washed in Scottish spring water to make it beautifully soft.

name: Samsung 12.0 kg Bespoke AI Front Load Washing Machine

gallery.alt: Samsung Bespoke AI Washing Machine Front View
Samsung Bespoke AI Washing Machine Angle View
Samsung Bespoke AI Washing Machine Display Panel
Samsung Bespoke AI Washing Machine Drum

description: Total AI Laundry with Perfect Washcare. Features Bespoke AI™ Laundry for smart, gentle washing. AI Ecobubble™ technology removes 24% more soil even in cool water, saves up to 70% energy and offers 45.5% better fabric care. Includes AI Energy Mode to monitor and reduce energy consumption. Complete your wash in just 39 minutes. The AI Ecobubble™ creates bubbles that detect fabric type and automatically adjusts bubbles amount, washing time, temperature and spin speed for optimal care.
